title: Assyrian rock relief at Yağmur
description: Inscribed relief, dated to the reign of Tiglath-Pileser I, on a large block near the fortified site of Yağmur in the Tur 'Abdin.

properties.description: Point representing the Assyrian rock relief at Yağmur, derived from an OpenStreetMap node after Genç 2023
properties.title: Assyrian rock relief at Yağmur
